title: Podcast 334: How to Make Healthy Decisions & Choices Under High Pressure & Anxiety
description:
Get your tickets to my 2021 Mental Health Retreat: https://www.drleafconference.com


EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I speak about the link between anxiety, stress and decision-making. Often, when we are in an anxious state, we cannot seem to make a decision, or, if we do, we end up making a choice we regret. I know this has happened to me many times! What should we do when this happens? Is there a way out of this mental swamp? Thankfully, yes!

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/stress-decision-making


Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app
